category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA122_download_dlg_conflicting_revisions_selection_mode
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to configure the default behavior of the document selector dialog for download operations when there are conflicting revisions and there is no local copy related to these revisions. Possible values: 0 - no action: prompts the user for selecting the revision to be downloaded (Default) 1 - most recent revision (among revisions listed in the dialog) is automatically selected
